title: Miscellaneous Theorems
content: Some of these theorems are used in the series of lemmas and theorems proving the defining properties of ` setrecs ` .

blocks.name: nfintd
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for intersection. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 16-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfintd(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, cint(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, cint(c0), cab(hs1, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))), w0)
  df-int(hs1, hs0, c0)
  nfabd(s0, hs1, w0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  nfald(s0, hs0, w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfimd(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfintd(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, â‹‚ c0))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, c0))
} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, â‹‚ c0, { hs1 | âˆ€(hs0,(hs0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ hs1 âˆˆ hs0))}, w0)
  df-int(hs1, hs0, c0)
  nfabd(s0, hs1, w0, âˆ€(hs0,(hs0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ hs1 âˆˆ hs0)))
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  nfald(s0, hs0, w0, (hs0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ hs1 âˆˆ hs0))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfimd(s0, w0, hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ hs0)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, F/(s0, hs1 âˆˆ hs0))
  nfv(s0, hs1 âˆˆ hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nfiund
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for indexed union. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 6-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfiund(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1), cab(hs0, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), w0)
  df-iun(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfabd(s0, hs0, w0, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfrexd(s0, s1, c0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfiund(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ c0, c1)))
  âŠ£ F/(s1, w0)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, c0))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ c0, c1), { hs0 | âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)}, w0)
  df-iun(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfabd(s0, hs0, w0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfrexd(s0, s1, c0, w0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: iunord
blocks.content: The indexed union of a collection of ordinal numbers ` B ( x ) ` is ordinal. This proof is based on the proof of ~ ssorduni , but does not use it directly, since ~ ssorduni does not work when ` B ` is a proper class. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 3-Nov-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iunord(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, word(c1)), word(ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wral(s0, c0, word(c1)), word(ciun(s0, c0, c1))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  sylc(wral(s0, c0, word(c1)), word(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wtr(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), con0))
  syl(wral(s0, c0, word(c1)), wtr(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, word(c1), wtr(c1))
  ordtr(c1)
  triun(s0, c0, c1)
  ssrdv(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, c1), con0, wral(s0, c0, word(c1)))
  syl5bi(wral(s0, c0, word(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  rexlimd(s0, c0, wral(s0, c0, word(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  nfra1(s0, c0, word(c1))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  syl6(wral(s0, c0, word(c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), word(c1))
  rsp(s0, c0, word(c1))
  ex(word(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  ordelon(c1, cv(hs0))
  mpii(wtr(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), con0), word(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), word(con0))
  ordon()
  3exp(wtr(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), con0), word(con0), word(ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  trssord(ciun(s0, c0, c1), con0)
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, word(c1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), con0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iunord(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Ord(c1))â†’ Ord(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Ord(c1))â†’ Ord(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1))), d(s0, c0))
  sylc(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Ord(c1)), Ord(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)), Tr(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)), â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)âŠ† On)
  syl(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Ord(c1)), Tr(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Tr(c1)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, Ord(c1), Tr(c1))
  ordtr(c1)
  triun(s0, c0, c1)
  ssrdv(hs0, â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), con0, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Ord(c1)))
  syl5bi(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Ord(c1)), hs0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), hs0 âˆˆ On, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1))
  eliun(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  rexlimd(s0, c0, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Ord(c1)), hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âˆˆ On)
  nfra1(s0, c0, Ord(c1))
  nfv(s0, hs0 âˆˆ On)
  syl6(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Ord(c1)), s0 âˆˆ c0, (hs0 âˆˆ c1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ On), Ord(c1))
  rsp(s0, c0, Ord(c1))
  ex(Ord(c1), hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âˆˆ On)
  ordelon(c1, hs0)
  mpii(Tr(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)), â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)âŠ† On, Ord(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)), Ord(On))
  ordon()
  3exp(Tr(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)), â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)âŠ† On, Ord(On), Ord(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)))
  trssord(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), con0)
  diff.hs0.c(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
  diff.hs0.w(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, Ord(c1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, con0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: iunordi
blocks.content: The indexed union of a collection of ordinal numbers ` B ( x ) ` is ordinal. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 3-Nov-2019.)

blocks.name: spd
blocks.content: Specialization deduction, using implicit substitution. Based on the proof of ~ spimed . (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 17-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: spcdvw
blocks.content: A version of ~ spcdv where ` ps ` and ` ch ` are direct substitutions of each other. This theorem is useful because it does not require ` ph ` and ` x ` to be distinct variables. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 12-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm spcdvw(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  mpsyl(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2))), wcel(c0, c1))
  ax-gen(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1, w2)
  spcimgft(s0, c0, c1, w1, w2)
  nfv(s0, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm spcdvw(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’(âˆ€(s0, w1)â†’ w2))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c1)
  âŠ£ (s0 = c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w2)
} = {
  mpsyl(w0, (âˆ€(s0, w1)â†’ w2), âˆ€(s0,(s0 = c0 â†’(w1 â†’ w2))), c0 âˆˆ c1)
  ax-gen(s0, (s0 = c0 â†’(w1 â†’ w2)))
  biimpd(s0 = c0, w1, w2)
  spcimgft(s0, c0, c1, w1, w2)
  nfv(s0, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: tfis2d
blocks.content: Transfinite Induction Schema, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 3-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm tfis2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), w1))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w2), w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  com12(w0, wcel(cv(s0), con0), w1)
  tfis2(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2))
  pm5.74d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w1, w2)
  com12(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wb(w1, w2))
  syl5bi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w2)), wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wral(s1, cv(s0), w2)))
  r19.21v(s1, cv(s0), w0, w2)
  a2d(wcel(cv(s0), con0), w0, wral(s1, cv(s0), w2), w1)
  com12(wcel(cv(s0), con0), w0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w2), w1))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w2)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tfis2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ On â†’ w1))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’(s0 = s1 â†’(w1 â†” w2)))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ On â†’(âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ s0, w2)â†’ w1)))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  com12(w0, s0 âˆˆ On, w1)
  tfis2(s0, s1, (w0 â†’ w1), (w0 â†’ w2))
  pm5.74d(s0 = s1, w0, w1, w2)
  com12(s0 = s1, w0, (w1 â†” w2))
  syl5bi(s0 âˆˆ On, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ s0,(w0 â†’ w2)), (w0 â†’ w1), (w0 â†’ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ s0, w2)))
  r19.21v(s1, s0, w0, w2)
  a2d(s0 âˆˆ On, w0, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ s0, w2), w1)
  com12(s0 âˆˆ On, w0, (âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ s0, w2)â†’ w1))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w2)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: bnd2d
blocks.content: Deduction form of ~ bnd2 . (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 19-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm bnd2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  sylc(w0, wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1)))), wcel(c1, universe), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, w1)))
  dedth(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe), wi(wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, w1)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1))))), wi(wral(s1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), wrex(s2, c0, w1)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, w1)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1)))), wral(s1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), wrex(s2, c0, w1)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1)))))
  raleq(s1, c1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), wrex(s2, c0, w1))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(c1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1))))
  anbi2d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe))), wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1)), wral(s1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1)))
  raleq(s1, c1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), w1))
  bnd2(s1, s2, s0, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), c0, w1)
  elimel(c1, universe, emptycls)
  0ex()
  diff.cif.s(s1, c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe))
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bnd2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1)))))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0, w1)))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w1)
} = {
  sylc(w0, âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1)))), c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0, w1)))
  dedth(c1, emptycls, c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, (âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0, w1))â†’ âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1))))), (âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0, w1))â†’ âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1))))))
  imbi12d(c1 = if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0, w1)), âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1)))), âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0, w1)), âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1)))))
  raleq(s1, c1, if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0, w1))
  exbidv(s0, c1 = if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), (s0 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1))), (s0 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1))))
  anbi2d(c1 = if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), s0 âŠ† c0, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1)), âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1)))
  raleq(s1, c1, if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ s0, w1))
  bnd2(s1, s2, s0, if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…), c0, w1)
  elimel(c1, universe, emptycls)
  0ex()
  diff.cif.s(s1, c1, emptycls, c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, if(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1, âˆ…))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c1, emptycls, c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)

}

blocks.name: dffun3f
blocks.content: Alternate definition of function, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 14-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffun3f(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  bitri(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))
  dffun6f(s0, s2, c0)
  anbi2i(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  albii(s0, wmo(s2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  mof(s2, s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))
  nfbr(s1, cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))
  nfcv(s1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(s2))
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dffun3f(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (Fun(c0)â†”(Rel(c0)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, âˆƒ(s1, âˆ€(s2,(s0[c0]s2 â†’ s2 = s1))))))
  âŠ£ F/(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ F/(s2, c0)
  âŠ£ F/(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  bitri(Fun(c0), (Rel(c0)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, âˆƒ(s1, âˆ€(s2,(s0[c0]s2 â†’ s2 = s1))))), (Rel(c0)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, âˆƒ*(s2, s0[c0]s2))))
  dffun6f(s0, s2, c0)
  anbi2i(Rel(c0), âˆ€(s0, âˆƒ*(s2, s0[c0]s2)), âˆ€(s0, âˆƒ(s1, âˆ€(s2,(s0[c0]s2 â†’ s2 = s1)))))
  albii(s0, âˆƒ*(s2, s0[c0]s2), âˆƒ(s1, âˆ€(s2,(s0[c0]s2 â†’ s2 = s1))))
  mof(s2, s1, s0[c0]s2)
  nfbr(s1, s0, c0, s2)
  nfcv(s1, s0)
  nfcv(s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)

  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
